required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Long-term Safety Surveillance Study in Participants Previously Treated With 177Lu-IPN01072
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicentre Surveillance Study to Evaluate the Long-term Safety in Participants Who Have Been Previously Treated With 177Lu-IPN01072 in an Ipsen-sponsored Clinical Study

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the protocol is to evaluate the long-term safety of medicine 177Lu-satoreotide tetraxetan (also known as 177Lu-IPN01072 or 177Lu-OPS201) for patients who have previously received 177Lu-satoreotide tetraxetan in the clinical study OPS-C-001 / D-FR-01072-001.

detailed_description.textblock: The study qualifies as interventional not because of the use of an investigational product, but because the imposed specific data collection includes assessments/blood collection and on-site visits not necessarily part of routine clinical practice.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of participants with second primary haematological and non-haematological malignancies.
primary_outcome.time_frame: During the whole study period (approximately 5 years).

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of treatment-related adverse events of any grade.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During the whole study period (approximately 5 years).
secondary_outcome.description: Adverse events assessed according to the National Cancer Institute-Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events Version 5.0 (NCI-CTCAE Version 5.0), including any treatment-related serious adverse events, as assessed by the investigators.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes over time in laboratory tests (haematology)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During the whole study period (approximately 5 years).
secondary_outcome.description: Laboratory parameters (Platelet count, Haemoglobin and White Blood Cells count with differential) will be graded according to the NCI-CTCAE Version 5.0.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes over time in laboratory tests (biochemistry)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During the whole study period (approximately 5 years).
secondary_outcome.description: Laboratory parameters (Creatinine) will be graded according to the NCI-CTCAE Version 5.0.

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall survival defined as the time from the first dose of 177Lu-IPN01072 until death from any cause.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: During the whole study period (approximately 5 years).

intervention.description: Participants will have surveillance visits every 3 months up to 5 years after their first dose of 177Lu-IPN01072 in Study OPS-C-001.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participant is capable of giving signed informed consent
- Participant must have received at least one infusion of 177Lu-IPN01072 in Study OPS-C-001
Exclusion Criteria:
- There are no exclusion criteria in this safety surveillance study.

patient_data.ipd_description: Where patient data can be anonymised, Ipsen will share all individual participant data that underline the results reported in the published journal article with qualified researchers who provide a valid research question. Study documents, such as the study protocol and clinical study report, are not always available.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Data are available beginning 6 months and ending 5 years after the publication of the findings in a journal; after this time, only raw data may be available.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: Proposals should be submitted to DataSharing@ipsen.com and will be assessed by a scientific review board.
